column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: Sɛ ɔbanyin anaa ɔbaa bi bɔ anohoba soronko
column8: dɛ orutu noho dze ama EWURADZE a:"

column2: "ɔnkam noho wɔ wenyin nye nsa dzendzen ho: mma ɔnnom wenyin kawee
column4: nkyii so mma ɔnnom esikyireamba nsa biara
column5: na onndzi esikyireamba momon anaa guanee so."

column2: "Noho nkamee nda nyinara mu mma onndzi biribiara a wɔdze wenyindua ho biribi ayɛ
"Noho nkamee anohoba nda nyinara mu no mma oyindam bi nnka ne tsir: ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn nkodu dɛ nda a ɔkaam noho maa EWURADZE wɔ mu no bɔso
"Nda a ɔakam noho ama EWURADZE no nyinara mma ɔnnkɔ nyimpa bi fun ho."
"Sɛ n’egya
column4: no nua anaa n’akyerɛbaa mpo wuwu a
column5: mma onnkogu noho fi: osiandɛ noho nkamee a ɔdze ma Nyankopɔn no wɔ n’etsifi."

column2: "Noho nkamee nda nyinara ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn ma EWURADZE."
"Na sɛ nyimpa bi wu awerɛfir mu wɔ ne nkyɛn
column3: na ogu noho nkamee tsir ho fi a; ɔno da a otsia esuon no onyi ne tsir wɔ n’ahoguar da no mu."

column2: "Na da a otsia awɔtwe no ɔmfa ntamram ebien
"na ɔsɔfo no mfa kor mbɔ bɔn ho afɔr
column3: na kor no so ɔmfa nyɛ ɔhyew afɔr
column5: dɛ ɔafom wɔ fun no ho
column6: na ɔntsew ne tsir ho da no ara."

column2: "Na ɔnsan nkam noho mma EWURADZE
column3: na ɔmfa eguambaanyin a oedzi afrenhyia mbra mbɔbɔ asodzi ho afɔr: mbom nkan no nda no ayɛ kwa
column4: osiandɛ noho nkamee no ho egu fi."

column2: "Na iyi nye Nazirinyi ho mbra
column3: aber a noho nkamee nda ewie du no: wɔmfa no mbra ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano:"

column2: "na ɔmfa ayɛyɛdze mbrɛ EWURADZE
column3: eguambaanyin a oedzi afrenhyia a onndzii dzɛm kor mbɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr
column4: na eguambaaber a oedzi afrenhyia a onndzii dzɛm kor mbɔbɔ bɔn ho afɔr
column5: nye oguannyin a onndzii dzɛm kor mbɔbɔ asomdwee afɔr
column8: nye isiam pa tatar a wɔdze ngo afrɔw
column9: nye epitsi tatar ntrɛtraba a wɔdze ngo egu do

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo no mfa mbra EWURADZE enyim
column3: na ɔmbɔ no bɔn ho afɔr

column2: "na ɔmfa oguannyin no mbɔ asomdwee afɔr mma EWURADZE
column3: nka epitsi boodoo kɛntsɛn no ho: ɔsɔfo no mbɔ n’edziban afɔr
column4: nye no nom afɔr no so."

column2: "Na Nazirinyi no nyi ne tsir no wɔ ehyiadzibuw no n’abowano
column3: na ɔmfa ne tsinhwi no ngu ogya no a ɔwɔ asomdwee afɔr ase no mu."

column2: "Na oeyi ne tsir no ekyir no
column3: ɔsɔfo no mfa oguannyin abasa a wɔanoa
column4: nye kɛntsɛn no mu epitsi tatar kor
column5: na epitsi tatar ntrɛtraba kor ngu Nazirinyi no nsamu
column7: "na ɔsɔfo no ntow no ɔtow afɔr wɔ EWURADZE enyim; iyi yɛ krɔnkrɔn ma ɔsɔfo no dze ka ɔtow nyan nye ohim aserɛ no ho: na ɔno ekyir no Nazirinyi no nnom wenyin."

column2: "Iyi nye mbra a ɔwɔ hɔ ma Nazirinyi na mbom sɛ ɔbɔ anohoba bi ka dza Nazirinyi yɛ no ho a
column3: otwar dɛ ɔpon dɛm anohoba no ka dza noho nkamee nhyehyɛɛ no kyerɛ no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Kasa kyerɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no dɛ
column5: Mbrɛ hom nsi nhyira Israelmba no nye yi; hom nse hɔn dɛ

column2: "EWURADZE ntsew n’enyim nkyerɛ wo
"EWURADZE mma n’enyi do nhwɛ wo
"Na wɔmfa me dzin nto Israelmba do dɛm; na mibehyira hɔn."
